channel.title: Ec956 on Fatih Kansoy
channel.description: Recent content in Ec956 on Fatih Kansoy

item.title: Macroconomics
item.description: This module provides students who have a mathematical background with an introduction to macroeconomics. It is taught using a mathematical approach, with the focus on providing an intuitive understanding to core economic theory, which will also include ‘real world’ applications. Graphical analysis will also be used to illustrate key concepts, giving students a different way of examining problems that will complement the mathematics skills learnt in other modules.

item.title: Exciting News! Funding Granted for Innovative Research-led Teaching in Economics
